Articles.Content:
I've started making a map that alows us forum users to claim a piece of Kerbin.

I's very easy, copy the map and edit it in paint, choose your color and name. Post a picture for the next person.

This is not a challenge, just 4 fun.
Can I make a suggestion that in order for anyone to claim one of the regions in your map, they should post a satellite image of a flag in the appropriate region to substantiate their claim.

13 minutes ago, Scarecrow said:

Can I make a suggestion that in order for anyone to claim one of the regions in your map, they should post a satellite image of a flag in the appropriate region to substantiate their claim.

Good suggestion, let's keep it optional and see where this goes...

I'm flying to Krimson as we speak, (43 minutes in) just to plant a flag (and set up a base).
I was going to submit KISS (Kerbal Island South Seas) but my paint programs - Photoshop and Faststone - are unable to open your map to edit.

I'm sorry to say it, guys, but claiming parts of Kerbin and then arguing over the claims is exactly what forced this forum to ban roleplaying. The arguments and feuds that resulted spilled over into other threads and led to many warns. This thread will be closed now.
